column1: To get the text of any element in the UI : getText
To repeat any action a particular number of times or loop over some actions : loop
To check whether any element, text, etc exists or is present or to validate an elements presence use : validate-exists
To check whether any element, text, etc DOES NOT exist or is NOT present or to validate an element is NOT present use : validate-not-exists
To check or execute any action conditionally : if
To mutate any stored text or extract some value from stored text, do arithemetic operations, etc : variable-expression
To compare between 2 text values to check whether they are equal : validation-equals
To compare between 2 text values to check whether they are not equal : validation-not-equals
To compare between 2 number values to check whether they are equal : validation-num-equals
To compare between 2 number values to check whether they are NOT equal : validation-num-not-equals
To compare between 1 num value is less than another : validation-num-le
To compare between 1 num value is greater than another : validation-num-ge
To check whether a text value is contained in another : validation-contains
To check whether a text value starts with another text value : validation-starts-with
To check whether a text value ends with another : validation-ends-with
